title: LF ADC for Clash/flexn with the fellas
body:
Looking for a Juice box of an ADC. Gold pref, but will take silvers if your extra juicy. We play socially most nights but like to play serious too. Skill isnt too important mainly just attitude and getting along with the squadron. Disc required. 

IGN: Jaycobe

Thanks :) xx

replies.body: Hey mate I'm looking for people to play with :) Like to play adc and love to have a bit of banter but also love to win. I sent you an add in game send us a message or something if you want to play :) ign awsumlad
